front.title: IEEE Approved Draft Standard for Testing and Performance of Hardware for All-Dielectric Self-Supporting (ADSS) Fiber Optic Cable
front.keyword: all-dielectric self-supporting fi ber optic cable
front.abstract: Hardware performance, test requirements, procedures, and acceptance criteria for an all dielectric self-supporting overhead cable with optical fi bers are covered in this standard. Functional requirements, such as electrical, mechanical, optical fi ber, environmental and test requirements related to design, installation, in-service, and maintenance, including routine tests, are covered.
